title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, February 17, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of English crime novelist Ruth Rendell (1930-2015), who said, “The tragedy of growing old is not that one is old but that one is young.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of English crime novelist Ruth Rendell (1930-2015), who said, “The tragedy of growing old is not that one is old but that one is young.”
